type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar with total tasks count, completed tasks count, and completion percentage is completely missing from dashboard page
Password validation (minimum 6 characters) is not implemented on either client-side registration form or server-side register endpoint - validatePassword function exists but is never called

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session expiry set to current time instead of 7 days in the future - sessions would expire immediately
Task title validation checks maximum 50 characters instead of specified 100 characters
Tasks sorted by creation date in ascending order (oldest first) instead of descending order (newest first)
Error response format inconsistent - auth endpoints return simple error strings instead of object with code and message fields

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Admin dashboard page not mentioned in specification - no admin functionality specified
Priority field (low/medium/high) selector not specified in task input requirements
Priority display and color coding not specified in task item requirements
Priority parameter in handleAddTask function not specified in requirements
Priority field handling in POST endpoint not specified in API requirements
Bulk operation functions (clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, toggleAllTasks) not required as features - only mentioned as transaction examples
